name: Ball Octopus
desc:
An aquatic creature that hunts by firing watery projectiles.

The ability to fire water bombs is of course not uncommon among Fontemer Aberrants. But for your average careless diver, most of whom are tourists, a high-pressure water current of this kind can pose a significant threat. The thickness of diving equipment is therefore necessary for two reasons â€“ firstly, to resist the pressure of the water itself, but secondly, to protect against the attacks of Fontemer Aberrants.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Transoceanic Pearl
dropMaterial.desc:
A small crystal obtained from a defeated Fontemer Aberrant.

Fontemer Aberrants arise from Fontaine's sea. They are believed to be a unique life form born from the mysterious energy in the water.

dropMaterial.name: Transoceanic Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
A crystal obtained from a defeated Fontemer Aberrant.

It gives off a somewhat mysterious energy. Although many legends speak of great life forms residing in remote seas beyond human reach, ordinary oceans can hardly compare to the vibrant seas of Fontaine.

dropMaterial.name: Xenochromatic Crystal
dropMaterial.desc:
A large crystal obtained from a defeated Fontemer Aberrant.

It contains a mysterious energy.

All rivers and seas originate in Fontaine, but the water loses all its unique properties once it flows outside Fontaine's borders.
